title: Worst Yet to Come After Wild Day for Indonesia Stocks, Funds Say
description: Global investors’ exit from Indonesian stocks sparked by MSCI Inc.’s investability warning is far from done, according to fund managers, raising the specter of a sustained market derating.
content: Global investors’ exit from Indonesian stocks sparked by MSCI Inc.’s investability warning is far from done, according to fund managers, raising the specter of a sustained market derating.
